title: OpenCart
description: To install the module, you will need to download the file below:
subtitle: Steps for OpenCart integration:

list.title: Login to your OpenCart admin panel.
Click Upload and select the zip file you downloaded.
Once installed, go to Extensions, select Extensions and under Choose the extension type, select Shipping.
Find OptimalShip in the list of extensions. If the module shows a red minus icon, it is already installed. If the green plus icon is showing, click the icon to install the extension.
Click the Edit icon for the OptimalShip extension.

orderedList: Your Export Number for the Account Number.
Add a surcharge if you’d like, or keep it at 0. This will be added as a flat fee on top of our total charge.
Enter “DHL with OptimalShip” as the Carrier Title.
Select countries to ship to. You can click “Select All” at the bottom. This will be all countries minus the US.
Under Tax Class, select “Taxable Goods.” (This is the most likely case, however select a different option if it applies to you.)
For Enable Dimensional Weight, select “Enabled.” This requires that your products have dimensions associated with them. (If you do not enable this option, shipping estimates may be incorrect.)
For Sort Order, select 1 is the top of the list.

list.title: Click the Save icon at the top of the page.
Go into your store and test it out to make sure DHL with OptimalShip appears as a shipping option. Please make sure you try it on an international address.
